tool_description: Dive into the world of trivia with Trivia and Quiz API! Access over 100k Questions and elevate your quiz game, apps, or platforms!
name: Trivia Quiz Questions API
title: Trivia Quiz Questions API

api_list.name: GlobalCountLookup
api_list.description: Returns the number of ALL questions in the database. Total, Pending, Verified, and Rejected.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trivia-quiz-questions-api.p.rapidapi.com/api_count_global.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trivia-quiz-questions-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetQuestion
api_list.description: Gets a certain amount of questions.

required_parameters.name: amount
required_parameters.description: Amount of questions you want to receive.

api_list.name: QuestionCountLookup
api_list.description: Returns the number of questions in the database, in a specific category.
